Download Muse Pro for Mac and Windows

Muse isn't currently available on mobile. To download the desktop app, visit the download page on a computer.

Mac download

Mac OS X 10.13.6 or higher

Download for Mac

For Macs with Apple Silicon (M1, M2) chips, download here

Windows download

Windows 10 or higher

Download for Windows

If you run into any issues or need assistance, contact us.

Muse Version 2.0.0

Your Feedback is Important to us.

We’re currently beta testing Muse Pro, so you may encounter minor bugs. Please let us know the issues you encounter on the contact form here so we can improve the app.

Add multiple channels, change quality in settings
Adjust buffer and sample rate in device settings
Adjust volume or mute each channel
New feature list
  • Audio quality selection: Stream up to PCM 32-bit lossless audio
    ‍
  • Change sample rate: Select from 8kHz to 192kHz
    ‍
  • Multi-channel selection: Choose any channels from your devices
    ‍
  • Reduced latency: Control the buffer of your devices to send audio faster*
    ‍*A lower buffer will stream audio faster, but will increase audio popping/dropouts
    ‍
  • Improved audio stability: No more speeding up/slowing down
    ‍
